Calculate spatial enrichment

Source: R/spatial_genes.R
calculate_spatial_enrichment.Rd

Calculate spatial enrichment. Multiple methods are provided.

.calc_spatial_enrichment_minimum(
  spatial_network,
  bin_matrix,
  adjust_method = "fdr",
  do_fisher_test = TRUE
)

.calc_spatial_enrichment_matrix(
  spatial_network,
  bin_matrix,
  adjust_method = "fdr",
  do_fisher_test = TRUE,
  do_parallel = TRUE,
  cores = NA,
  calc_hub = FALSE,
  hub_min_int = 3,
  verbose = TRUE
)

.calc_spatial_enrichment_dt(
  bin_matrix,
  spatial_network,
  calc_hub = F,
  hub_min_int = 3,
  group_size = "automatic",
  do_fisher_test = TRUE,
  adjust_method = "fdr",
  cores = NA
)

Functions

  • .calc_spatial_enrichment_minimum(): calculate using a 'simple' and efficient for loop

  • .calc_spatial_enrichment_matrix(): calculate using 'matrix' implementation

  • .calc_spatial_enrichment_dt(): calculate using 'data.table' implementation

Contents

Developed by Ruben Dries, Jiaji George Chen, Joselyn C. Chávez-Fuentes, Guo-Cheng Yuan, Matthew O’Brien, Edward Ruiz, Wen Wang, Natalie Del Rossi.
